message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your range.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $175. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of the product at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe that $100 would be a fair price for the product. I hope you can consider my counteroffer.

I understand that you're sticking to your initial offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet in the middle. I'll offer the product to you for $125. It's a bit higher than your initial offer, but I think it's still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're willing to consider this offer.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe that $100 would be a fair price for the product. I hope you can consider this final offer.
